waffle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a flat cake, marked with a pattern of deep squares
waffle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: talk or writing that uses a lot of words but says nothing important
waffle.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to talk or write using a lot of words but without saying anything important
waffle.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Stop waffling and get to the point.
waffle.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to be unable to decide what action to take
waffle.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: He cannot continue to waffle on this issue.
